content.query:
CREATE VIEW gold.Calender
AS
SELECT *
FROM 
    OPENROWSET
    (
        BULK  'https://storagedatalakeawp.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )AS query1


---------
